name: Balanced Mini-Shotgun
raw:
<font color=#009B00>

This Instruction Manual will teach you how to assemble a:
  'Balanced Mini-Shotgun'
 The Construction kit. must be between Quality Level  121 and  140.
 All other pieces must be of AT LEAST that level range... 
 Add them using shift+right-click.
  Add in following order:
 
  1. Shotgun Weapons Construction kit. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  484 ->  560
 
  2. Explosion Propulsion Containment Chamber. SkillTo Assemble: Quantum FT:  454 ->  525
 
  3. Self-Cleaning KO-CR Device. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  424 ->  490
 
  4. Short Composite Barrel. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  393 ->  455
 
  5. Nano Pylon. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  302 ->  350
 
  6. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 1x Layer. SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra:  182 ->  210
 
  7. Notum Alloy Strengthened Ribs. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  302 ->  350
 
  8. Rapid-Reload-And-Fire Gyro. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  484 ->  560
 
  9. Nano-Interfaced Cooling System. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  484 ->  560
 
  10. Lock and Stock. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  484 ->  560
 
  11. Nano Pylon. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  302 ->  350
